data.__comment_rtl: Sets if the language is RTL (Right to Left) (1: yes, 0: no)
data.__comment_htmllang: Sets the lang in the <html> on all pages
data.__comment_charset: Sets the character set, blank uses the default.
data.name: English

packages.__comment_seperator_0: PIT Change forum languages data(difference with language pack base data)
packages.__comment_is_default: is default language pack in that exist in mybb package... other language pack can't be default...
packages.__comment_mybb_mod_pid: can find from url of that like https://community.mybb.com/mods.php?action=view&pid=1675
packages.__comment_mybb_mod_codename: can find from details of that project(in edit page)
packages.__comment_mybb_userid: can find from url of user profile like https://community.mybb.com/user-79079.html
packages.__comment_githubrepo: github repo base link (for browse) like: https://github.com/ParsanIT/MyBB-Persian-Language-Pack
packages.__comment_githubrepo_release_zipball: github repo suggestion release asset like: https://github.com/ParsanIT/MyBB-Persian-Language-Pack/archive/refs/tags/1839.zip

__comment_includes.settings_translation: Inserted setting language strings into standard method(inc/languages/{common_name}/admin/settings.php), true or false
__comment_includes.install_upgrade_translation: Install and upgrade is translated in this languagepack?  true or false
__comment_includes.acp_theme: if package contain acp theme, input name of that(same as that folder) here

__comment_recommended.acp_theme: if a theme has spcefic option for your language such as RTL, input required data of that here such as below

packages.__comment_name: The friendly name of the language
packages.__comment_admin: Sets if the translation includes the Admin CP (1: yes, 0: no)
packages.name: English (American)
